title: RP in Japan
body: does anyone know how to avail RP points (NA) here in Japan?

replies.body:
When you say "avail RP points", what do you mean exactly?  Do you mean you have pre-paid cards bought in NA that you want to use in Japan?

With a bit further information, I should be able to help out!

a Japanese player told me (NA server) that he bought V-Precca card. its like  he converted the said card into RP...the problem is first, I dont even know how to use that card and second, I forgot his IGN xD

well, its a card available in every convenience stores here in Japan though

Unfortunately, if you are looking to purchase an RP card in Japan to be used on your NA account, this does not seem possible.  Prepaid cards are usually region locked, so the only way to do this is to have a friend purchase it in NA, mail it to you, and then you can redeem it on your NA account.  

You can also check[ this article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/203701590-What-payment-methods-are-available-to-me-) out for more info on our payment options.
